response.summary: My background in Mechanical Engineering as well as my hands on experience in the different areas of the Aviation MRO environment and Electrical Equipment Industry has allowed me to provide our customers with solutions for their needs. I have ample experience in airframe and component repairs, and designing of junction box electrical enclosures.To put it simply, thin-walled structures design. During my career, I have developed repairs fabrications to restore structural components back to serviceable condition and some structural engineering in similar areas.
response.skills: Computer-Aided Engineering (CAE), AFGROW, EES: Engineering Equation Solver , SolidWorks, Autodesk Inventor, CATIA, Matlab, Pipe Flow Expert Software, NX: Siemens PLM Software, scilab

profile_positions.description:
Mechanical & Aeronautical engineering services.

Development of major structural repairs on transport and combat aircraft and rotorcraft, large and small, metallic and composite structures.

• Stress analysis and eng. reports of repairs with inspection requirements driven by damage tolerance analyses (DTA).
• Prepare repair drawings and simulations using Solidworks, Solidedge, AFGROW and ANSYS.
• Modernizing and expanding existing fueling systems; receiving, dispensing, and storage Jet fuel facilities.
profile_positions.title: Senior Stress Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Develops and designs courses and curriculum.
Edits and develops online learning materials.
Creates learning experiences and environments.
Designs learning activities, assignments, and assessments.
Creates computer-based training (CBT) modules and storyboards
profile_positions.title: Instructional Designer

profile_positions.description: Liberating our design engineers from repetitive tasks to concentrate on new and special designs of Junction Box Enclosure Design by Automation using SolidWorks API on Sheet Metal Module. Outputs can include 3D models, 2D drawings, eDrawings files, DXFs, DWG files, bills of materials (BOMs), cutting lists, and Paint usage.
profile_positions.title: Mechanical Designer

profile_positions.description: Aaerospace solutions in maintenance, repair, overhaul, design, development and manufacturing. Work involved CAD modelling, drafting, FEA simulations using ANSYS
profile_positions.title: Ingeniero en Análisis de Estructuras Aeronáuticas

education.grade: Curso en relación de los parámetros del proceso de inyección de plástico
MANEJO BÁSICO DE LA HERRAMIENTA PLM CATIA V5 PARA EL DISEÑO DE NUEVOS PRODUCTOS

company.name: Fuerza Aeroespacial Colombiana
company.description:
La Fuerza Aeroespacial Colombiana tiene como misión volar, entrenar y combatir para vencer y dominar en el aire, el espacio y el ciberespacio, en defensa de la soberanía, la independencia, la integridad territorial, el orden constitucional y contribuir a los fines del Estado.

Visión: Para ejercer el dominio en el aire, el espacio y el ciberespacio, la Fuerza Aeroespacial será innovadora, polivalente, interoperable, líder y preferente regional, con alcance global y con capacidades disuasivas reales, permanentes y sostenibles.
